articles.author: Seung Min Kim, Michelle L. Price
articles.title: Trump says US to boycott G20 in South Africa, repeating allegations about treatment of white farmers - AP News
articles.description: President Donald Trump says no U.S. government officials will be attending the Group of 20 summit this year in South Africa, citing the country’s treatment of white farmers. Trump had already announced he would not attend the annual summit for heads of state …
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Donald Trump said Friday that no U.S. government officials would be attending the Group of 20 summit this year in South Africa, citing the countrys treatment of white farmer… [+1788 chars]
